title: Personal information can be disclosed in case of business transfer or insolvency

tosdr.case: may sell your data in merger
tosdr.tldr: SoundCloud “We may disclose your personal information to any person or company that acquires all or substantially all of the assets or business of SoundCloud, or on a merger of our business, or in the event of our insolvency. ”

topics.description: When you give your data to a company, you need to keep in mind that this company can get acquired by another company, with different policies. What happens in that case?
